ЁЯХКя╕П
Peace and Prosperity

His reign was free from wars and was peaceful. It can be called the golden age of Pallava architecture.

ЁЯЫХ
Dravidian Style (Structural Temples)

He initiated the construction of structural temples instead of rock-cut temples.

ЁЯУМ
Important Facts (Exam Points)
  • Titles: Rajasimha (King of Lions), Agamapriya (lover of scriptures), Shankarabhakta.
  • Temples: Built the 'Kailasanatha Temple' (Rajasimhesvara) in Kanchi and the 'Shore Temple' in Mahabalipuram.
  • Literature: The famous writer Dandin (author of Dashakumaracharita) was in his court.
  • Diplomacy: Sent envoys to China and received the title of 'Commander' from the Chinese emperor.
